original_text: For the cherubim spread out their wings over the place of the ark, so that the cherubim overshadowed the ark and its poles.
korean_text: 그룹들이 그 궤 처소 위에서 날개를 펴서 궤와 그 채를 덮었는데

sentences.original_text: For the cherubim spread out their wings
over the place of the ark
so that the cherubim overshadowed the ark
